notifications.body:
What is dependency injection and why should you use it? In this webinar you’ll learn about what alternatives there are for using dependency injection in a Java App. We’ll also look at how Vaadin supports CDI and Spring autowiring for doing dependency injection. Join Peter Lehto and Matti Tahvonen from Vaadin on this webinar by signing up to this webinar.

Webinar takes place on Thursday October 6, 2016 @ 2PM CEST
notifications.title: Webinar: Dependency Injection Alternatives with Vaadin

notifications.body:
How do you like your Vaadin? What do you usually have as a side-dish with it? Where do you find your recipes for awesome apps?

Results will be public info in the blog so you can see how others have answered. And we'll learn more about the community at the same time.

Help Vaadin by answering this one page survey.
notifications.title: Vaadin Community Survey

notifications.body:
We are looking for new team members! Vaadin is growing and we need your help to help our customers and grow even more. 

We are looking for Java Developers and Front-End Developers, and many more!
notifications.title: Want to join Vaadin team?

notifications.body:
Want to have a Vaadin presentation at your local event? We've received really good feedback and are happy to join you and your group as well – let's schedule it together!

Contact Vaadin Advocate Ville Ingman at ville@vaadin.com for more info.
notifications.title: Speech at your meetup or company?
